programme.desc: A vampire travels to England to seduce a visitor's fiancé and manages to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal
programme.desc: Time to head out west and spend some time in the historic town of Tucumcari, New Mexico. See proof of the dinosaurs that once roamed these parts and learn of a college that has a lot of unusual courses.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends: Then and Now
programme.desc: Wes and Murph discuss some of the unfortunate tragedies that have shaken the sports world to this day.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: On July 31, 1993, a 19-year-old woman was kidnapped and raped. The DNA was submitted to AdavanceDNA and was able to track down the suspect.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella is forced to deal with painful memories when Det. Valens visits the lab and says her DNA is connected to a Philadelphia cold case making her a suspect. Mac's career is put in jeopardy when an international investigation is opened against him.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team is puzzled when evidence and witnesses point to John McEnroe as a murder suspect despite his airtight alibi and as Mac's investigation causes a political firestorm, the team worries that he'll be dismissed when they are asked to testify.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Following the largest drug seizure in city history, Mac, Stella and Hawkes are forced to save the lab when, in an elaborate heist, a drug lord and his crew descend upon the CSI's vault to retrieve their merchandise and two CSIs are held hostage.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team find human blood on the crown of the Statue of Liberty, leading them on a race against time to save a famous musician from death at the hands of a vigilante.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police have trouble pinning a suspect to the scene of the crime in a deadly drive-by-shooting, even after investigating cell phone calls and shell casings, they turn to the dirt in the perpetrator's tires.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A forensic scientist makes history when he uses material from a dentist's office to solve a 10-year-old crime involving an elderly couple that was brutally murdered during a robbery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An obstetrician tried unsuccessfully to revive a man's wife who he found covered in blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young college student is found strangled and badly burned. Investigators get a break when a trace evidence expert uncovers the murder weapon in the spool of a vacuum.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man's wife had taken her own life, and his college sweetheart had killed herself in much the same fashion fourteen years earlier. Investigators had to determine if this was a coincidence or an attempt to get away with murder twice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the mid-1980s, bodies of nude woman were found in remote hills of California. The police got a break when a known prostitute escaped an attacker and was able to identify him and his automobile. The suspect was 50-year-old Roger Kibbe.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappears without a trace, and even though foul play is suspected the trail goes cold. After twenty years a group of volunteer forensic scientists locate her body and bring the killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities believe that the death of a news anchor is the result of a tragically overzealous fan, but when a police dog tracks the killer back to the crime scene, officers are forced to include the crowd of onlookers in their list of suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators initially believed a house fire that killed a woman was unintentionally caused by a cigarette, but a closer look by scientists uncovers more to the story.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators believed they were looking for 2 murder weapons and 2 suspects, until further analysis of evidence set them down a different path, closer to home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police recover a submerged car, but don't find the missing man they were looking for.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a successful real estate agent is brutally murdered, panicked townspeople begin looking over their shoulders and locking their doors.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A married soldier begins a dangerous affair and a Canadian wife ends a life.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Coventry, England an office romance gets out of hand and leads to a woman's disappearance. A devious plan to kill a prominent politician in Reno is in the works.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: An internet love triangle leads to deception and murder near Buffalo, New York. On the outskirts of London, England, a romantic stroll through the woods ends with a brutal attack.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Lebanon, Maine, an estranged wife trying to start a new life can't escape her violent past. In Vincennes, Indiana, a married engineer falls for the babysitter and leads her on a downward path to murder.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A newlywed wife has a violent ex-husband in Washington State, and in Lisburn, Northern Ireland, a Fire Chief wants to extinguish a love rival.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A cheating husband trains a lover to become an assassin in Daytona Beach, Florida.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A gigolo uses his attractive girlfriend to set a deadly trap in Sarasota, Florida.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A cheating wife demands a deadly favour from a lover in Centre Hall, Pennsylvania.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Catherine and the rest of the CSI team find it challenging to get a good read on their new team member as he joins them in tracking a recently active serial killer who has been killing since the seventies.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: When a popular politician is murdered, Keppler convinces Catherine to go behind the backs of her teammates with a controversial method to find the killer. Catherine agrees to this plan, despite her reservations about lying to her long-time CSI partners.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Nick and Keppler's case leads them to uncover a black market for human body parts while the rest of the team investigates the case of a wealthy married woman who was found murdered in her own home.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom returns from his teaching sabbatical as Keppler tries to conceal his ties to a double murder case that he and his CSI colleagues are investigating.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom is shocked to discover that the miniature killer is still at large and has sent a miniature forewarning of slayings to occur the next day. Grissom laments that he delayed the investigation by being on sabbatical when the unmarked package arrived.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom and his team try to piece together what has become of a basketball star and his cheerleader girlfriend who didn't return home after a big game. Grissom thinks that the young lovers may have run off to Mexico but the evidence disputes that theory.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: While processing the house where several showgirls were murdered, Sara is haunted by the terrified eyes and cryptic dying words of the sixth victim she discovers.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Greg is forced to again contend with the hostile mother and brother of the hoodlum he killed in self-defence several months ago when the team discovers that the brother is involved in a new murder case.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: While Grissom and the rest of the CSIs are out on various cases, Hodges gets his lab tech colleagues to join him in a covert operation to solve the miniature killer cases.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The CSIs discover that several suspects in a woman's murder are members of a bizarre UFO club who believe that shape-shifting, reptile-like aliens have mated with humans for centuries as a means of conquering the human race.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: In their attempt to identify the murderer of a has-been boxer who lived among a group of prostitutes who detested him, the team must establish which of several life-threatening acts against him in one night actually killed him.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom and his team go behind the scenes at a horror adult film studio when one of their lead actresses is murdered on the set of her latest movie.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A young woman who is murdered has several different blood types in her system. During the course of the investigation, the CSIs discover that their victim is the daughter of a wanted criminal.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Sara's uneasy about Grissom being reunited with Lady Heather during the CSI's investigation of her attempted murder by a client she refuses to name.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: As the CSI team comes closer than ever to identifying the miniature killer, Sara mysteriously goes missing, forcing her relationship with Grissom out into the open.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The CSI team rushes to find Sara, the latest victim of the miniature killer, as her life hangs in the balance in the Vegas desert.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An exotic dancer who listens to voices in her head is a prime suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Canadian financier assumes the name of a co-worker as part of a money-laundering scheme. The man turns up dead in the ocean, with an anchor tied around his torso.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An evening out to a murder mystery theatre turns into a real life whodunit.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young, happily married woman died tragically in a horseback riding accident. Her husband seemed far from grief-stricken and, when they investigated his background, police discovered a web of lies and a proficiency with pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police found an abandoned car on the highway and assumed the driver had been the victim of a car-jacking. When they find the victim's body, unusual marks on her body lead to her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Illinois police discover a footprint on a birthday card that could lead to the home invader who killed a man and attacked two young girls.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An entire family found dead inside their burned-out home appears to be a murder-suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A well-respected nurse in a small community dies in a car accident. Investigators suspect drunk driving, until test results come back showing no alcohol was ingested.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: Lou Pearlman, known as the 'boy band mogul' behind Backstreet Boys and *NSYNC, used his music business success to attract money into his fraudulent investment program.

programme.desc: Richard Scrushy, CEO of HealthSouth, was accused of misleading shareholders and the government.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: A former champion basketball player's schemes land him in prison and his mother kicked out of her home.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a video game developer found murdered at work.

programme.desc: As tax time rolls around, IRS agents are being murdered and the team must find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio's world is rocked when he receives shocking information about his deceased brother and he must determine whether or not he should share the information with Yelina. Meanwhile, a woman is murdered at a popular nightclub.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A bitter child custody battle culminates in a shooting on the courthouse steps.

programme.desc: The team investigates when a family is trapped on a burning boat in shark-infested waters.
